text: The Amarillo Starlight is the largest diamond found by a park visitor in the Crater of Diamonds State Park in Arkansas since 1972, when it was established as a state park. The Amarillo Starlight was found by W. W. Johnson of Amarillo, Texas in 1975 while he was vacationing at the park with his family. When unearthed, it was a white diamond, but it has since been cut into a marquise shape. Its value has been estimated between $150,000 and $175,000. ==References== * Crater of Diamonds State Park * Largest diamond found in park Category:Diamonds originating in the United States Category:Pike County, Arkansas Category:1975 in Arkansas Category:Individual diamonds
title: Amarillo Starlight
